  13. (**************************************************************************)

  15. (* Insert instrumentation for afl-fuzz *)

  17. open Lambda
  18. open Cmm

  20. module V = Backend_var
  21. module VP = Backend_var.With_provenance

  23. ‌let afl_area_ptr dbg = Cconst_symbol ("caml_afl_area_ptr", dbg)
  24. ‌let afl_prev_loc dbg = Cconst_symbol ("caml_afl_prev_loc", dbg)
  25. ‌let afl_map_size = 1 lsl 16

  27. ‌let rec with_afl_logging b dbg =
  28.   if !Clflags.afl_inst_ratio < 100 &&
  29.     Random.int 100 >= !Clflags.afl_inst_ratio then instrument b else
  30.   let instrumentation =
  31.     (* The instrumentation that afl-fuzz requires is:

  33.          cur_location = <COMPILE_TIME_RANDOM>;
  34.          shared_mem[cur_location ^ prev_location]++;
  35.          prev_location = cur_location >> 1;

  37.        See http://lcamtuf.coredump.cx/afl/technical_details.txt or
  38.        docs/technical_details.txt in afl-fuzz source for for a full
  39.        description of what's going on. *)
  40.     let cur_location = Random.int afl_map_size in
  41.     let cur_pos = V.create_local "pos" in
  42.     let afl_area = V.create_local "shared_mem" in
  43.     let op oper args = Cop (oper, args, dbg) in
  44.     Clet(VP.create afl_area,
  45.       op (Cload ({memory_chunk=Word_int;
  46.                   mutability=Asttypes.Mutable;
  47.                   is_atomic=false})) [afl_area_ptr dbg],
  48.       Clet(VP.create cur_pos, op Cxor [op (Cload {memory_chunk=Word_int;
  49.                                                   mutability=Asttypes.Mutable;
  50.                                                   is_atomic=false})
  51.         [afl_prev_loc dbg]; Cconst_int (cur_location, dbg)],
  52.       Csequence(
  53.         op (Cstore(Byte_unsigned, Assignment))
  54.           [op Cadda [Cvar afl_area; Cvar cur_pos];
  55.             op Cadda [op (Cload {memory_chunk=Byte_unsigned;
  56.                                  mutability=Asttypes.Mutable;
  57.                                  is_atomic=false})
  58.                         [op Cadda [Cvar afl_area; Cvar cur_pos]];
  59.                       Cconst_int (1, dbg)]],
  60.         op (Cstore(Word_int, Assignment))
  61.           [afl_prev_loc dbg; Cconst_int (cur_location lsr 1, dbg)]))) in
  62.   Csequence(instrumentation, instrument b)

  64. and instrument = function
  65.   (* these cases add logging, as they may be targets of conditional branches *)
  66.   | Cifthenelse (cond, t_dbg, t, f_dbg, f, dbg) ->
  67.      Cifthenelse (instrument cond, t_dbg, with_afl_logging t t_dbg,
  68.        f_dbg, with_afl_logging f f_dbg, dbg)
  69.   | Ctrywith (e, ex, handler, dbg) ->
  70.      Ctrywith (instrument e, ex, with_afl_logging handler dbg, dbg)
  71.   | Cswitch (e, cases, handlers, dbg) ->
  72.      let handlers =
  73.        Array.map (fun (handler, handler_dbg) ->
  74.            let handler = with_afl_logging handler handler_dbg in
  75.            handler, handler_dbg)
  76.          handlers
  77.      in
  78.      Cswitch (instrument e, cases, handlers, dbg)

  80.   (* these cases add no logging, but instrument subexpressions *)
  81.   | Clet (v, e, body) -> Clet (v, instrument e, instrument body)
  82.   | Clet_mut (v, k, e, body) ->
  83.     Clet_mut (v, k, instrument e, instrument body)
  84.   | Cphantom_let (v, defining_expr, body) ->
  85.     Cphantom_let (v, defining_expr, instrument body)
  86.   | Cassign (v, e) -> Cassign (v, instrument e)
  87.   | Ctuple es -> Ctuple (List.map instrument es)
  88.   | Cop (op, es, dbg) -> Cop (op, List.map instrument es, dbg)
  89.   | Csequence (e1, e2) -> Csequence (instrument e1, instrument e2)
  90.   | Ccatch (isrec, cases, body) ->
  91.      let cases =
  92.        List.map (fun (nfail, ids, e, dbg) -> nfail, ids, instrument e, dbg)
  93.          cases
  94.      in
  95.      Ccatch (isrec, cases, instrument body)
  96.   | Cexit (ex, args) -> Cexit (ex, List.map instrument args)

  98.   (* these are base cases and have no logging *)
  99.   | Cconst_int _ | Cconst_natint _ | Cconst_float _
  100.   | Cconst_symbol _
  101.   | Cvar _ as c -> c

  103. ‌let instrument_function c dbg =
  104.   with_afl_logging c dbg

  106. ‌let instrument_initialiser c dbg =
  107.   (* Each instrumented module calls caml_setup_afl at
  108.      initialisation, which is a no-op on the second and subsequent
  109.      calls *)
  110.   Csequence
  111.    (Cop (Cextcall ("caml_setup_afl", typ_int, [], false),
  112.          [Cconst_int (0, dbg ())],
  113.          dbg ()),
  114.     with_afl_logging c (dbg ()))
